entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
